name: American Chamber of Commerce in Spain
goal: AmChamSpain’s main aim is to work to improve the Spanish economy’s competitiveness, productivity and internationalization, attract and stimulate investment and commerce between the U.S. and Spain, and promote the exchange of science and technology between the two countries.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, TTIP, EU-US Privacy Shield
